BlackNightmare:

The femme advenced with decition and set her gun in his neck and 
said in aloud voice "ANSWER US! WHAT'RE YOU DOING HERE?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Alex Sell <kraftlos@g...> wrote:
> Celeron didn't notice Blacknightmare as he entered a particularly
> interesting room and began looking through the various equipment in
> there, seeing what he could take.  Like last time, he stupidly 
asumed
> there was no one onboard the wreck and they wouldn't mind him 
taking
> whatever he wanted.  He also was making a lot of noise.
